review: This is a great product. The picture quality is amazing, even with a slow internet connection, and it's pretty simple to use and setup. I love that you can download a remote app on your phone for it too (although apparently apple hasn't jumped on that band wagon yet). I much rather use the Fire TV Stick than my PS3, Samsung TV, or WiiU. Not only is the picture quality better, but you can only assume that your sucking up a little less electricity using this than a gaming console, BD player or computer if you connect the power source to the TV's flash port. It's also super convenient if you use the amazon cloud feature as a prime member. It's easier and faster to transition from one app to another than any of my BD players or consoles. I'd definitely harass my friends into buying this. ^_^
